text: Takadanobaba Station (高田馬場駅,たかだのばばえき) is a railway station of JR East, Tokyo Metro, and Seibu Railway in Shinjuku, Tokyo, Japan. ==Adjacent stations== ;JR East :Yamanote Line ::Shin-Ōkubo - Takadanobaba - Mejiro ;Tokyo Metro :Tōzai Line ::Ochiai (T-02) - Takadanobaba (T-03) - Waseda (T-04) ;Seibu Railway :Seibu Shinjuku Line :Ltd Express "Koedo" ::Seibu Shinjuku - Takadanobaba - Tokorozawa :Ltd Express "Kawagoe" ::Seibu Shinjuku - Takadanobaba - Tanashi :Commuter Express, Express, Semi Express ::Seibu Shinjuku - Takadanobaba - Saginomiya :Local ::Seibu Shinjuku - Takadanobaba - Shimo-Ochiai ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in Tokyo
title: Takadanobaba Station
